title: Маска. Танцы
overview: This is the first Russian version of the successful The Masked Dancer format, a spin-off of the famous The Masked Singer. Fourteen star participants will perform in the new project, and five jury members will try to guess who is behind the mask using clues. Sergei Svetlakov, Yegor Druzhinin, Klava Koka, Timur Rodriguez and Maria Gorban will be at the same judging table.
